short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove keyboard auto focus when loading a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some webpages pre select the keyboard focus on search boxes. While handy for some web surfers, I find this feature rather disruptive to my workflow. 

This simple extension helps remove the auto focus when loading a page.
